attrs.script: Output_var="`hostname`" while IFS= read -r i do useperc=`echo $i | awk '{print $5}' | cut -d '%' -f1 | grep -viEw 'use|mounted'` mnt_lst=`echo $i | awk '{print $6}' | cut -d '%' -f1 | grep -viEw 'use|mounted'` if [ -z "$useperc" ] ; then continue; fi if [[ "$useperc" -gt 40 ]] then Output_var+="$mnt_lst$usepercUnhealthy(>40%)" else Output_var+="$mnt_lst$usepercHealthy" fi done <<< "$(df -kh)" Output_var+="#~~#" echo "Output_var=$Output_var"
